title: Prohibiting New Investment in and Certain Services to the Russian Federation in Response to Continued Russian Federation Aggression

enrichment.summary: This executive order bans new investments by U.S. persons in Russia and restricts the provision of certain services to Russia in response to its ongoing aggression. It also prohibits U.S. persons from facilitating or financing transactions that would violate these restrictions, aiming to increase economic pressure on Russia.
potential_concerns: The prohibitions on new investments and services to Russia directly burden U.S. corporations and investors with existing or planned economic interests, potentially reducing profitability and international business opportunities.
Employees of large corporations engaged in commerce or investment with Russia may face job insecurity or layoffs due to restricted business activities caused by these sanctions.

Foreign nationals associated with affected Russian entities could experience indirect negative effects due to limitations on U.S.-origin services and investments, complicating international business relationships.
